phrs.translation: 笨重的, 宏扔躯样, 高大的, 绿巨人

sentences.sentence: I don't want that hulking great computer in my office.
sentences.translation: 我不要把那台又笨又大的计算机放在我的办公室。

sentences.sentence: When I woke up there was a hulking figure staring down at me.
sentences.translation: 我醒来时，有个巨形身影正低头盯着我看。

sentences.sentence: Most telling was the 62% fall in sales of Hummers, GM's hulking military-style SUVs.
sentences.translation: 降幅更大的有通用体型笨重的军用型SUV悍马，销量下挫62%。
